mapper.insert: INSERT INTO torrents (info_hash, name, size, private_torrent) VALUES (#{e.infoHash}, #{e.name}, #{e.size}, #{e.privateTorrent}) ON CONFLICT (info_hash) DO UPDATE SET size = CASE WHEN torrents.size <= 0 THEN #{e.size} ELSE torrents.size END, private_torrent = CASE WHEN torrents.private_torrent IS NULL THEN #{e.privateTorrent} ELSE torrents.private_torrent END
